headline: Southern Company: Another Unique Way To Gain Exposure To The Rise Of Artificial Intelligence
summary: SO's revenue grew in 2Q25, but profits dipped. With AI-driven data center demand, SO's CAPEX plan & liquidity prep reveal a 19% upside. Click here to read more.
